articles.author: Abner Li
articles.title: Pixel Tablet gets first discount at Google Store - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google is giving the Pixel Tablet its first-ever discount 45 days after the June 20 launch. The $499 Pixel Tablet with 128GB of storage is $60.
articles.content:
Google is giving the Pixel Tablet its first-ever discount 45 days after the June 20 launch.
The $499 Pixel Tablet with 128GB of storage is $60 off to $439, while the 256GB model is $519 after an $80… [+1229 chars]
